original_text: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
korean_text: 하나님이 이르시되 그가 나를 사랑한즉 내가 그를 건지리라 그가 내 이름을 안즉 내가 그를 높이리라

sentences.original_text: Because he hath set his love upon me
I will set him on high
because he hath known my name
